meanings.sent1: The squirrel was skitterier than the turtle.
meanings.sent2: The rabbit was skitterier than the snail.
meanings.sent3: The skitterier kitten chased after the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her skitterier movements resembled a dancer on tiptoes.
meanings.sent5: The skitterier butterfly fluttered gracefully from flower to flower.

meanings.definition: More skittish or nervous than something else
meanings.sent1: The skitterier cat hid under the bed during the storm.
meanings.sent2: The skitterier dog barked at the sound of thunder.
meanings.sent3: The skitterier horse jumped at the sight of a butterfly.
meanings.sent4: Her skitterier behavior made her friends worry about her.
meanings.sent5: The skitterier bird flew away at the slightest noise.
